reviews.review_msg: Course material is tough, but Geoff is great. You're not doing bond analysis until the 5th lecture. Be ready to get confused by all these terms, but he posts assignment solutions on his website. Will only answer course material questions in class and not in OH. He's a 5-6% guy, he's laughing. Easily one of the smartest and most chill profs at SFU.
Course uses Mathematica to do the later assignments.  Template programs are provided.  Almost all evaluation based on take home assignments.

This course was very quant heavy. Probably too quant heavy for Beedie. I didn't follow most of it, BUT Poitras summarizes everything and straight up tells you everything you need to know in simple terms to do well on the assignments. So difficult concepts, but easy to get a decent grade. One of the few profs that IS a reason to take a course.
